1523910.name: Riddle of the Sphinx™ Soundtrack (The Awakening Edition)
1523910.description: Re-experience the epic ancient Egyptian of Riddle of the Sphinx™ with the original, richly orchestrated soundtrack. Jeff Tobler composed and performed each piece*, recording some of the most moving instrumental solos on his midi EVI (Electronic Valve Instrument). This release features tracks unique to Riddle of the Sphinx™ The Awakening™ edition. Enjoy!
